channel.title: Comments on: Dell WoW Laptops Auction

item.title: By: boogally
item.dc:creator: boogally
item.description:
Which is more fun? Playing WOW on a laptop almost anywhere in the world outside of your house when taking your desktop with you is not a possibility? Or, not playing at all?
P.S. the laptop probably has better specs than your l33t home made pc. Reading idiotic comments FTW!!!
item.content:encoded:
Which is more fun? Playing WOW on a laptop almost anywhere in the world outside of your house when taking your desktop with you is not a possibility? Or, not playing at all?

P.S. the laptop probably has better specs than your l33t home made pc. Reading idiotic comments FTW!!!

item.title: By: Dreaming
item.dc:creator: Dreaming
item.description:
Playing on laptops is no fun, playing on Dells is no fun, having fancy art doesn't make it better.
Waste of money.
But a gold site buying one would be hillarious.
item.content:encoded:
Playing on laptops is no fun, playing on Dells is no fun, having fancy art doesn’t make it better.

Waste of money.

But a gold site buying one would be hillarious.
